mapper.select: SELECT USER_ID , NAME , EMAIL , NICK_NAME , PICTURE_ID , LOGIN_TYPE , LAST_LOGIN_DATE , REG_DTM , REG_ID , MOD_DTM , MOD_ID FROM USER_TABLE

SELECT USER_ID , NAME , EMAIL , NICK_NAME , PICTURE_ID , IF(PICTURE_ID = NULL, 'user_profile_default.png', (SELECT FILE_NM FROM FILE_TABLE WHERE FILE_ID = PICTURE_ID)) PICTURE_NM , LOGIN_TYPE , LAST_LOGIN_DATE , REG_DTM , REG_ID , MOD_DTM , MOD_ID FROM USER_TABLE WHERE USER_ID = #{id}
SELECT T3.ROLE_ID , T3.ROLE_NM FROM USER_TABLE T1 , USER_ROLE T2 , ROLES T3 WHERE T1.USER_ID = #{id} AND T1.USER_ID = T2.USER_ID AND T2.ROLE_ID = T3.ROLE_ID ORDER BY T3.ROLE_ID DESC LIMIT 1
